newsitem.title: USA: CBOT rice closes lower on export ideas, technicals.
newsitem.headline: CBOT rice closes lower on export ideas, technicals.

text.p: CBOT rice futures closed lower on ideas for U.S. rice exports to remain slow with technical pressure also cited after the market Wednesday ran into and backed down from chart resistance levels, traders said.
"Mexico's imports are expected to decline 50,000 tonnes because of the decline in the value of the Peso and on shipping costs," a trader said.
Rice closed unchanged to two cents per cwt lower, with November down one at $9.93.
